summary:
The Basket - Meticulously crafted basket of several cryptocurrencies which are utilized in numerous trusted Staking & DeFi platforms to strengthen the buy-back & burn process.

 EXTREME DEFLATION - The final supply of BSKT will reach only 2,100,000 BSKT. In order to achieve deflation, the initial supply of BSKT tokens has been set at 21 million (21,000,000) and the final supply will be 10% of that value, or 2.1 million (2,100,000).

 INNOVATION OF TOKEN - A unique token with many innovative features.

 STAKING PLATFORM POS - Receive rewards for supporting the network by placing BSKT on the staking platform.

 Team - The BSKT team consists of blockchain fanatics and investors who share a common passion and vision to create an innovative project.

 OUR VISION IS TO CREATE INVESTMENT OPTIMISATION ECOSYSTEM FOR ALL VISION - 

 Frequently Asked Questions FAQ - Below is a collection of answers to the most frequently asked questions.
